title: EFL Reading Instructional Design in Multicultural Environments: Culturally Responsive Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English reading proficiency and foundational multicultural education theory
context.additional_context: Focuses on strengthening reading instruction competencies for pre-service teachers, reflecting motivational and strategic differences of multicultural learners

learning_goals: Learners can analyze reading motivation factors among students from diverse cultural backgrounds.
Learners can develop lesson plans applying culturally differentiated reading strategies (metacognitive, socio-emotional).
Learners can develop project-based assessment tools for multicultural reading instruction.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
